full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 YOUR DEPENDENT LIFE INSURANCE PLAN Your Dependent Life Insurance Plan is insured with The Travelers Insurance Company. This Plan offers you life insur- ance protection for your dependents at low group rates. In the event of a dependent's death, the amount of his or her coverage will be paid to you. Eligibility If you are a permanent employee, you may enroll your dependents in the Dependent Life Insurance Plan on your first day of active work. Dependents eligible for coverage are: Your spouse Your unmarried children between the ages of 14 days and 19 years Your unmarried children from age 19 to their 23rd birthday, who have their legal residence with you, are wholly depen- dent upon you for maintenance and support, and who are registered full-time students Dependent children 19 years of age or older who are physi- cally or mentally handicapped, if they are covered as depen- dents up until their 19th birthday. You must provide proof of their inability to engage in self-sustaining employment within 31 days of their 19th birthday PUBLICATION NUMBER 59-7130, AUGUST, 1983 1
